ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:34:46 [Issue ID 4000-675987] urn:comicvine:4000-675987 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:21:09. [Issue ID 1822582]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Master Matrix has been unearthed as well as all the secrets of S.H.I.E.L.D.'s LMD program...
At the heart of this program were MARY AND RICHARD PARKER, A.K.A., The Amazing Spider-Parents.
Just when you thought you could trust that two people were without blemish, Deadpool somehow ruins them, too.
